page.title: 13Hutton Industrial Estate
page.content: None of the factories in Hutton Industrial Estate are older than twenty five years.Transport nowadays is a lot easier because of the Dartford Tunnel,and the M25 and an airport which makes it quicker to travel from one place to another. Some of the different factories in Hutton are a yoghurt factory,a packaging factory and also light engineering.The estate is in a semi- rural area.From the windows of the factories green fields can be seen.There was a fire at a packaging factory in Hutton and police were worried that people would be harmed by toxic fumes caused by burning plastics.Fire engines had to come and fight the fire with hoses.
